mapper.select: select order_trade_sum,order_refund_sum,order_sum_count,order_pay_count,order_refund_count,order_count_date from order_count where SUBDATE(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 Day) < order_count_date group by substring(order_count_date,1,10)
select goods_category name,sum(sum) value from goods_order_count where day = #{time} group by goods_category
